statements: DELETE FROM RouteOptimization WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B';
DELETE FROM RouteOptimization WHERE traffic_conditions = 'Heavy Traffic' AND time_estimate > 60;
DELETE FROM routes WHERE route_name = 'Route A';
DELETE FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE route_id = 1 AND historical_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM route_history WHERE route_id = 3 AND average_speed > 60;
DELETE FROM route_optimization WHERE route_id = (SELECT id FROM traffic_patterns WHERE route_name = 'Highway X' AND start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B');
DELETE FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE segment_id = 5 AND date = '2021-10-15';
DELETE FROM RouteOptimizationSystem WHERE route_name = 'Main Route';
